mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, LEARNINGLANGUAGE.*FROM LEARNINGLANGUAGE WHERE ${param2} LIKE '%${param3}%') A WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+(#{param1}-1)*10 AND #{param1}*10
mapper.update: UPDATE LEARNINGLANGUAGE SET NAME = #{name}, PWD = #{pwd}, REGDATE = #{regDate} WHERE PROFILE_MID= #{profile_mid}
